page.title: 03How do we get about ?
page.content: The principal means of transport in the area is the{motor vehicle,}with almost all families having access to one car. Most have two. Main roads are two-lane and most of the others are single-track, metalled.{Bus services run through Rolleston and Fiskerton on the Newark to Mansfield via Southwell route and through Fiskerton and Morton on the Southwell to Nottingham route. Although some famillies depend upon these sevices, they are not heavily used. A{school bus}service is provided to Southwell. The{railway}line has unmanned passenger stations at Fiskerton and Rolleston used by a few city commuters. Deisel trains also haul coal and oil. No goods are delivered to the area via these stations.{Bicycles}are widely used for door to door deliveries, shopping and recreation.
